price: If only they had believed and feared Allah, they would have had a better reward from Allah, if only they knew!
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
